players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Charlie seems nervous, and I'm not sure if he's hiding something."
Charlie: "Bob seems to be acting suspiciously, and I'm not sure if he's the mafioso."
You: "Charlie, I think you're just trying to distract us from your own guilt. You seem nervous because you know you're the mafioso."
Diana: "Bob, I think Charlie is telling the truth. He's just trying to figure out who the mafioso is."

players.name: Charlie
